unsolved: How are cross-device applications used outside of the lab
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
devices_included: Any screen device; Phone; Tablet; Smart watch; Laptop; Desktop computer
use_cases_desc: Many examples of logging data and visualisations for studying web-based cross-device applications.
contribution_desc:
Paper focuses on analysis of web-based cross-device applications, and on what metrices to use.
Implemented in XD-Analytics tool.
